About me

Hi!, Im Diego López García from Illescas (Spain)

Soy amante del desarrollo, en especial del desarrollo web. Construí este sitio con la intención de apuntar mis conocimientos por si en un futuro quiero recordarlos, lo hago en formato web porque así puedo compartirlos con mas personas.

I made this site in case I ever want to remember something, but also, to share my knowledge with the world

In my free time I like to play videogames. I like also graphic design, all of my knowledge of this topic, I've learned it by myself

Actually, I work as web developer beacuse it mix the two things I like, programming and design. Usually I work with Angular, cause it is one of my favorite web technologies out three I worked in Angular since 2006, where Angular 2 beta was realeased, but I want to learn something new, maybe VueJS (each day I like Javascript more).

If I have to work in the server side, I use Spring because with Java I'm confortable.

If you want to contact me, you can send me an email to:

diego.lopezgarcia@hotmail.com
